page.title: 05HOUSING IN KILTARLITY
page.content:
The housing in the area is mostly of a scattered nature,the largest group of houses being in the village centre of Kiltarlity.The houses vary greatly in type and age.A survey of the 51 families in Tomnacross school produced these results. Detached 28 Own garden 50 Semi-detached 14 Open fire 45 Terraced 9 Second storey 36 Central heating 25
Recently there has been a great deal of new building in the area,with about 30 new private houses being started or completed in the last year.Almost all the new houses are bungalow types. Of the houses built in the last 5 years about 20% have been built on crofts to replace the original croft houses.Many other croft houses have been modernised or extended.
